sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"试验"之意。
means: trial ： 指为观察、研究某事物以区别其真伪、优劣或效果等而进行较长时间的试验或试用过程。
experiment ： 多指用科学方法在实验室内进行较系统的操作实验以验证、解释或说明某一理论、定理或某一观点等。
test ： 普通用词，含义广，指用科学方法对某物质进行测试以估价其性质或效能等。
try ： 普通用词，多用于口语或非正式场合，指试一试。

word_mean: 实验：为发现或证明某种事实或普遍真理而进行的操作

sentence.Network_en: He is always eager for new experiences and ever-willing to experiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是渴望拥有新的经历，而且永远愿意尝试。

sentence.Network_en: This was demonstrated in a laboratory experiment with rats.
sentence.Network_cn: 在实验室用老鼠进行的实验证明了这一点。

sentence.Network_en: Ellis bristles at accusations that Berkeley's experiment is ill-conceived.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃利斯对有人指责伯克利的实验考虑不够周密感到气愤。

experiment 实验工作, experiment 实验的, experiment 实验性

list.abs: 经验主义强调经验（experience）和证据（evidence），主张人出生下来就像一张白纸，透过感官经验累积知识，因此人类大部分的 …
更字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 更换;替代〖 replace〗 经过,经历〖 experience〗 连续,接续〖 continue〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin experimentum, from experiri 'try'. Compare with experience and expert

entry.def: An experiment is a scientific test which is done in order to discover what happens to something in particular conditions.

example.ex: The astronauts are conducting a series of experiments to learn more about how the body adapts to weightlessness...
example.tran: 那些宇航员正在进行一系列实验，以更多地了解身体如何适应失重状态。

example.ex: ...a proposed new law on animal experiments...
example.tran: 有关动物实验的最新法规提案

entry.def: If you experiment with something or experiment on it, you do a scientific test on it in order to discover what happens to it in particular conditions.

example.ex: In 1857 Mendel started experimenting with peas in his monastery garden...
example.tran: 1857年，孟德尔开始在修道院的菜园里用豌豆做实验。

example.ex: The scientists have experimented on the tiny neck arteries of rats...
example.tran: 科学家们已经在老鼠细小的颈动脉上做了实验。

entry.def: An experiment is the trying out of a new idea or method in order to see what it is like and what effects it has.

example.ex: As an experiment, we bought Ted a watch.
example.tran: 我们试着给特德买了一块手表。

example.ex: ...the country's five year experiment in democracy...
example.tran: 该国5年来对民主的尝试

entry.def: To experiment means to try out a new idea or method to see what it is like and what effects it has.

example.ex: ...if you like cooking and have the time to experiment...
example.tran: 如果你喜欢烹饪而且有时间尝试的话

example.ex: He believes that students should be encouraged to experiment with bold ideas.
example.tran: 他认为应该鼓励学生们将大胆的观念付诸试验。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of conducting a controlled test or investigation

sentences.sentence: "not all experimentation is done in laboratories"

means.word_mean: 3. a venture at something new or different;

sentences.sentence: "as an experiment he decided to grow a beard"

means.word_mean: 1. to conduct a test or investigation;

sentences.sentence: "We are experimenting with the new drug in order to fight this disease"

means.word_mean: 2. try something new, as in order to gain experience;

sentences.sentence: "The composer experimented with a new style"

auth_sentence.content: The album was an opportunity for Bell to experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The album was an opportunity for Bell to experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The album was an opportunity for Bell to experiment.

auth_sentence.content: Still, this is far from a failed experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Still, this is far from a failed experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Still, this is far from a failed experiment.

auth_sentence.content: The Sex ID test was originally an online experiment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Sex ID test was originally an online experiment.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 凭经验[或观察]的,经验主义的
stems_affixes.word_buile: empiric[n.经验主义者,[古]江湖医生]+al……的→adj.凭经验[或观察]的,经验主义的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验的, 根据实验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: experiment实验+al……的→adj.实验的, 根据实验的
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验上, 用实验方法
stems_affixes.word_buile: experimental实验的+ly……地→adv.实验上, 用实验方法

stems_affixes.value_cn: 经验主义者,[古]江湖医生
stems_affixes.word_buile: em出+piri=peri尝试+c→尝试出来的→经验
empiric[n.经验主义者,[古]江湖医生]+ism主义→n.经验主义
ex出+peri尝试+ment表名词→尝试出来→实验

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实验, 试验, 实验法
stems_affixes.word_buile: experiment[n.实验;试验 v.[on]进行实验;做试验]+ation表名词→n.实验, 试验, 实验法
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家
ex出+peri尝试+ence表名词→尝试出来的东西→经验
ex出+peri尝试+ment表名词→尝试出来→实验
ex出+pert=peri尝试→尝试出来→[成为]专家, 行家

Sentence.sentence: He did experiments to different materials.
Although no form of matter yet discovered moves as fast as or faster than light, scientific experiments have already confirmed that accelerated motion causes a traveler's time to be stretched.
Mandelbrot, who did the experiment with stock exchanges prices, for example, noted that although the outcomes were variable, there were in fact certain constancy
James hiked, fished, learnt to sail and experimented with hot air ballooning.

Whether they experiment with three-year degrees, offer year-round classes, challenge the tenure system—or all of the above—universities are slowly realizing that to stay competitive and relevant they must adapt to a rapidly changing world.

sentences.en: We should like to do another experiment.
sentences.cn: 我们倒是很想再做一个实验。

jushi.english: If you want to gain knowledge, you must take advantage of the experiment.
jushi.chinese: 你要想获得知识,你就得利用这个实验。

jushi.english: He had his experiment report all written out neatly.
jushi.chinese: 他请人把实验报告写得清清楚楚。

jushi.english: We have never shown our disappointment at the failure in the experiment.
jushi.chinese: 我们从未对实验失败表示灰心。
